-- 순서 바꾸기 UPDATE t_board_category SET cord = case
when cord = #{cord} AND cord > 1 then cord - 1 when cord = #{cord} - 1 then cord + 1
when cord = #{cord} then cord + 1 when cord = #{cord} + 1 then cord - 1
ELSE cord END WHERE cord > 0 AND cord < (SELECT cord FROM t_board_category order by cord desc limit 1) + 1;
